unnormalised: Arre bhai, saw that article about the new defence deal. Wondering what the difference is between a Lt. Gen. and a Maj. Gen. anyway? Heard Col. Sharma is getting promoted soon, maybe to Brig.? Seems like a big jump in responsibility. Also, does anyone know what rank Cdr. Verma held before retiring? Just curious about these things, ya know?
normalised: Arre bhai, saw that article about the new defence deal. Wondering what the difference is between a Lieutenant General and a Major General anyway? Heard Colonel Sharma is getting promoted soon, maybe to Brigadier? Seems like a big jump in responsibility. Also, does anyone know what rank Commander Verma held before retiring? Just curious about these things, ya know?
